message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we compromise at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $102?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $110?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. However, I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?

I've already compromised quite a bit, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to stand firm at my minimum price of $120. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
